name: Lgames
tagline: This repo contains different little games. You can have a try and experience the game.
body:
# LGames
This repo contains different little games. You can have a try and experience the game.
1.LBoxShooter, based on Unity3d. Shoot the box to win the game. Once, you lose or beat the level, shoot the rotated text to continue.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
